snippet.title: Ziggy Official Trailer (Steam)
snippet.description:
#afilgames #indiegame #ziggy

Ziggy is a challenging precision platformer game about a little lightning bolt trying to go back home. Your main objective is to slide past all traps, dash through arrows and get to the end. 
Can you do it? ❤️

Get yours! Link below!👇👇👇
⚡Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/ziggy-switch/
⚡XBOX: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/ziggy/9pcjfnx1b1n0
⚡Microsoft Store:  https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/ziggy-windows/9p120f5fwqzs
⚡Playstation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP8511-PPSA17601_00-0865126918348910
⚡Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2190320/Ziggy/

🎮 Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AfilGames
🕹️ Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AfilGames
⚔️ Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/afilgames/
